title: Distance Learning Program for Enhancing Academic English

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental English Reading/Writing Skills and Introductory Understanding of Academic Activities
context.additional_context: Conducted in a digital device-provided environment, focusing on cultivating academic English skills linked to mathematics.

learning_goals: Identify core elements of academic paper structure (introduction, methodology, results, discussion) with 90% accuracy
Write structured essays of over 500 words using academic terminology related to mathematics topics
Complete and submit peer-feedback-integrated academic writing assignments three or more times on the LMS platform
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
